title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline.
body: I was working fine about 12 hours ago, but now my league client updated/patched (Don't remember which) and now it says the above statement. I saw the discussion where it says to delete the gameflow line, but when I do that and save, nothing happens to resolve the issue.

replies.body: The gameflow line was a setup for a previous issue.  The problem you're reporting now sounds like a new situation, thanks for letting us know!  I was able to login just fine, so we'll need to dig deeper to see if this issue is specific to you or more widespread.  Were you in a game and disconnected, or just trying to login?
I was just trying to login today, and thank you for replying so quickly! =D

You bet, and thanks for the follow-up!  In this case, help me rule out some possibilities with some basic troubleshooting.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case there are any blocks or network problems failing to get you to our authentication servers.  Let me know if that helps.
I am getting the same issue. It let me log in 30 mins ago. Got off to get something to eat and now saying cant connect. I changed reigons from NA to Japan and was able to log in there. Very weird.
